description: Floor of geometric mean of n and the reversal of n.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,2000
formula: a(n) = floor[ {n * R(n)}^(1/2)], where R(n)= the digit reversal of n (A004086).
prog: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 100); for (n=1, 2000, x=n; r=0; while (x>0, d=x-10*(x\10); x\=10; r=r*10 + d); write("b061229.txt", n, " ", floor(sqrt(n*r))) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 19 2009]
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Apr 23 2001
extensions: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 17 2009 at the suggestion of R. J. Mathar
